title: Manoharam Necklace: Emerald, Ruby & Diamond Statement Necklace
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity). Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This stunning necklace blends traditional Kasulaperu elements with a contemporary design. The central emerald is surrounded by smaller diamonds and ruby accents, complemented by emerald teardrop dangles. Intricate filigree detailing on the gold setting enhances the overall richness of the piece.
occasions: and other special occasions. Can also be styled with contemporary outfits for a touch of traditional elegance.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional design and modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality gemstones and the Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting heirloom piece. The intricate filigree work showcases exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail. This Manoharam Necklace will surely be the center of attention wherever you go.
